title: Another unknown handwritten script
content:
Hi, i'm also having trouble identifying this second rough handwritten script font. If anyone can help it would be much appreciated. Many thanks, J

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724115107im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ref5_6362.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ref5.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724115107/http:/typophile.com/files/ref5.jpg) | 90.27 KB |
author: jatl

comments.content:
It looks like custom lettering - not a font.  
(Take a look at the 4 different /e's)
Thanks for your reply. If that's the case, do you know of any fonts that are similar or in keeping?

Similar feeling Xtreem by Måns Grebäck [http://www.dafont.com/xtreem.font?fpp=100&text=The+Animated+Series](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724115107/http:/www.dafont.com/xtreem.font?fpp=100&text=The+Animated+Series "http://www.dafont.com/xtreem.font?fpp=100&text=The+Animated+Series")  
Mistral [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/mistral/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724115107/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/mistral/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/mistral/")  
Don

Thanks for your help, I think the closest i've been able to find so far is Geronimo...  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/geronimo/regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724115107/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/geronimo/regular/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/geronimo/regular/")  
It has some similarities so I might be able to work with it for now.

Lower case on Blaze catches the feel of this staccato rough script

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724115107im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BlazeItalic_4700.jpg)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/blaze/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724115107/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/blaze/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/blaze/")  
Don
